sqlMap.select: select t.data_item_id,t.parent_id,t.data_item_name,t.data_item_value,t.data_item_code,t.type from sys_data_item t where t.is_valid='1' order by t.orderby
select * from sys_data_item where is_valid = '1' and parent_id = #dataItemId# order by orderby asc
select * from sys_data_item t where t.is_valid = '1' and t.PARENT_ID in (select data_item_id from sys_data_item t where t.is_valid = '1' and t.data_item_code = #dataItemCode#) order by orderby asc

select * from sys_data_item where is_valid = '1'
data_item_code = #dataItemCode#
data_item_is = #dataItemId#
type = #type#
order by orderby asc
select * from sys_data_item t where t.is_valid='1' and data_item_code = #dataItemCode# order by t.orderby
select * from sys_data_item t where t.is_valid='1' and parent_id = #dataItemId# order by t.orderby

select t.data_item_id,t.parent_id,t.data_item_name,t.data_item_value,t.type from sys_data_item t start with t.data_item_code = #dataItemCode# and t.is_valid = '1' connect by prior t.data_item_id = t.parent_id order by t.orderby
select max($key$) as maxkey from $tableName$ where $key$ like '$id$%'
